top_comments.comment: Money is an issue that everyone has for a better and luxurious life, life was hard for me until I started trading bitcoin and am now earning $20,000 per week.

Since I'm in my 50's I can't quit, no one will hire an "old man" so I started a soap and beard care business. It hasn't taken off yet but I'm hopeful in a couple years I'll be able to relax a bit and sell my soap full time.
No and No...I receive emails every week from recruiters but the corporations they a recruiting for do not pay a living wage so, I say no thank you.

I quit being a boss , sold my restaurant business, paying the highest California taxes. I couldn’t even pay for an affordable healthcare insurance for my family while insurance companies reported billions in profits. I was working 80hrs a WEEK. It’s awful and sad.
